title: Miami's Su√°rez appears to spit on Seattle staffer
content: Inter Miami forward Luis Su√°rez appeared to spit on a Seattle Sounders staffer after his team's 3-0 loss in the Leagues Cup final at Lumen Field on Sunday night.

title: QB Prescott glad 'solution' reached with Parsons
content: Dak Prescott said while he didn't expect the Micah Parsons trade, he was glad a solution was reached ahead of the season opener.

title: Sources: Chiefs, McDuffie don't reach extension
content: The Chiefs and Trent McDuffie, their top cornerback, are not expected to agree to a multiyear contract extension before the start of the season.

title: Verlander earns win No. 265 with 121-pitch effort
content: Giants veteran Justin Verlander struck out 10 in five scoreless innings, throwing 121 pitches to earn the 265th win of his career.

title: Djokovic into record-extending 64th major quarter
content: Novak Djokovic dominated qualifier Jan-Lennard Struff 6-3, 6-3, 6-2 on Sunday night at the US Open to reach his record-extending 64th Grand Slam quarterfinal.

title: Briscoe captures second straight Southern 500
content: Chase Briscoe held off Tyler Reddick at Darlington Raceway on Sunday night and advanced to the second round of the NACAR Cup Series playoffs.

title: Charlie Woods makes ace during Junior Players
content: Charlie Woods made an ace on the third hole at TPC Sawgrass in the final round of the Junior Players Championship.

content: Fulham were furious when Josh King's goal was ruled out at Chelsea, while Manchester United's late victory over Burnley came courtesy of a VAR penalty.

title: Miranda Wang wins FM Championship by 1 over Jeeno Thitikul
content: Miranda Wang delivered clutch shots over the final three holes for a 2-under 70 and a one-shot victory over Jeeno Thitikul on Sunday in the FM Championship on Sunday.

title: WWE Clash in Paris results: Rollins keeps title, holds off Uso, Punk and Knight
content: Seth Rollins retained the World Heavyweight Championship against Jey Uso, CM Punk, and LA Knight, while John Cena beat Logan Paul at WWE Clash in Paris.

content: Let's project the NFL's best -- and worst -- offenses and defenses. Plus, how do all 32 teams rank overall, and who will make the Super Bowl?

title: Guide to the rookie class: Who is flying under the radar? Who will win OROY, DROY?
content: Here's everything you need to know about this group of first-years, including Rookie of the Year front-runners.

title: Mike Clay's Playbook, Part 3: How to manage your team post-draft

title: Norris' Dutch GP DNF makes the 2025 F1 title Piastri's to lose
content: Lando Norris' DNF at Sunday's Dutch GP may well be the decisive moment of the 2025 F1 season, when the title became Oscar Piastri's to lose.

title: Lee Corso's farewell to 'GameDay': Behind the scenes of a football celebrationÔªø
content: Fans, many without tickets to the game, came from all over the country to Columbus to get a glimpse of Corso one last time.

title: From Collier to Clark and more: How injury returns could impact the playoffs
content: Napheesa Collier and Breanna Stewart are back, with more injured stars eyeing returns before the postseason.

title: FSU's Tommy Castellanos trolls Alabama, sells 'Nick Can't Save Them' shirts
content: Castellanos made headlines after saying the legendary coach couldn't save the Tide from their matchup.

title: 'The Rich Eisen Show' on ESPN: How to listen and watch
content: 'The Rich Eisen Show' is joining forces with ESPN platforms! Find out how to get your weekday dose of pop culture and sports now.

title: Home-grown innovations: KabadiMan rides to Belagavi Tech Meet 2025 on Hoopoe Electric
content: The event brought together entrepreneurs, corporate leaders, and innovators to underline how tier-2 cities, like Belagavi, are driving meaningful technological change and creating solutions with global relevance

title: India rains LIVE: Yellow alert issued in Delhi; IMD forecasts heavy rain
content: Rainfall in September ‚Äî the last official monsoon month ‚Äî is like in previous months, expected to be ‚Äòabove normal‚Äô, or 9% more than the usual average of 16.7 cm.

title: Bihar SIR hearing LIVE: Supreme Court to hear RJD, AIMIM pleas on extension of deadline for claim filing
content: The parties have urged the Court to direct the Election Commission of India (ECI) to extend the last date for receiving claims and objections to September 15, 2025

title: SCO summit: India has been facing scourge of terrorism for last seven decades, says PM Modi
content: Chinese President Xi Jinping called up for setting up ‚ÄòSCO development bank‚Äô as soon as possible to for economic cooperation among member states

title: India's MPL to sack 60% of local staff after paid gaming ban, source says
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi's government this month banned online paid games, citing financial and addiction risks especially among youth, leading to a shutdown of many gaming apps

title: Maratha quota: Manoj Jarange vows to give up water as his protest enters fourth day
content: Manoj Jarange has been staging an indefinite hunger strike at the Azad Maidan from August 29, 2025 over his demand for a 10% quota for Marathas under the OBC category

content: The state received 440.8 mm of rainfall against the season's average of 256.8 mm; the excess was more than 100% in five districts

title: Accused in Kannapuram blast case remanded
content: Investigators said that Anoop, a businessman, had no political connections, contrary to the allegations of the CPI(M) and the Congress

content: The seven districts under heavy rain alert are Kumaram Bheem Asifabad, Mancherial, Nirmal, Peddapalli, Jayashankar Bhupalpally, Mulugu and Bhadradri Kothagudem

title: Start early, reach safely: Hyderabad police on Ganesh idol immersions
content: Police appealed to the organisers to reinstate the earlier practice of starting processions early in the morning and completing them by evening, so that devotees can return home early and safely

title: Australian government invites Lokesh to take part in its Special Visits Programme
content: The invite is in appreciation of Andhra Pradesh‚Äôs leadership in the fields of human resources, technology, and economic development

title: Shortage of trains, high bus fares disrupt Keralites‚Äô travel plans
content: Passengers demand more special trains and KSRTC inter-State buses, to destinations like Bengaluru and Chennai, during the festival season

title: Karnataka Minister Priyank Kharge meets Poland‚Äôs Deputy Prime Minister to strengthen technological ties
content: Karnataka‚Äôs Minister for Rural Development & Panchayat Raj and Information Technology Priyank Kharge met Deputy Prime Minister and Minister for Digital Affairs of Poland Krzysztof Gawkowski, during his official visit to Poland

title: Police, excise step up vigil to curb flow of drugs, liquor
content: Searches are being carried out at railway stations in the city and suburbs in view of the Onam season; Excise dept. readies two units of ‚Äòstriking force‚Äô to deal with emergency situations

content: The Department of Posts says it is closely monitoring the situation and making every effort to restore services at the earliest

content: ‚ÄúWe won‚Äôt budge from the protest venue till demands are met even if the Fadnavis government fires bullets at us,‚Äù Mr. Jarange said

content: The victim was sleeping in her room and her roommate had gone out when the alleged incident took place

content: Naga People‚Äôs Front MLA K√ºzholuzo Nien√º sought a special session to discuss impact of Devil worship on the youth in the Christian-majority State

title: India and China are victims of terrorism, PM Modi tells Xi,¬†in a shift from recent positions
content: PM raised issue of Pahalgam attack during bilateral meeting, called for China‚Äôs support, says Foreign Secretary; side-steps query on China‚Äôs support to Pakistan during Operation Sindoor

title: Centre deputes teams to assess damage in disaster-hit States
content: Inter-Ministerial Central Teams¬†to visit Himachal Pradesh, Uttarakhand, Punjab and J&K; relief works under review

title: Trinamool leaders, kin in list of tainted teachers published by WBSSC
content: BJP and CPI(M) leaders say these names proved the complicity of the higher-ups in the teacher recruitment scam

title: Chief Minister, Harish Rao engage in wordy duels over Kaleshwaram Project, Ghose Commission of Inquiry Report
content: The exchanges mainly centred around availability of water at Tummidihatti and Medigadda locations, the reasons behind re-engineering and re-designing of projects

title: Bihar Assembly polls: NDA will cross 200 seats; INDIA bloc to fall below 40, says Nityanand Rai
content: Union Minister of State for Home Affairs¬†alleges ‚ÄòVoter Adhikar Yatra‚Äô was held to mislead people and shelter ‚Äúinfiltrators‚Äù

title: Metro connectivity changes Kolkata‚Äôs commute
content: Three new stretches of the Kolkata Metro Railway, which became operational in the last week of August 2025, have brought relief to passengers of the bustling metropolis. Moyurie Som takes stock of what the new network brings to West Bengal‚Äôs capital, and whether the authorities are prepared to meet the challenges that come with it

title: SCCL unions demand improved measures for safety at 49th¬†Safety Tripartite Review Meeting
content: The SCCL has already set an example in coal production, and it is equally the responsibility of all to shape it into an accident-free company, Singareni CMD said

title: Mamkootathil finds powerful voices of support in Congress, signalling possible end to political isolation
content: UDF convener Adoor Prakash terms the sexual misconduct charges against Mamkoothatil ‚Äòunsubstantiated‚Äô and says that the Palakkad MLA will attend the Assembly session that commences on September 15

title: Researchers identify new tuber species from Western Ghats in Kerala‚Äôs Wayanad district
content: The newly identified species has been named Dioscorea balakrishnanii after V. Balakrishnan, environmentalist and current secretary of the Kerala State Biodiversity Board

title: Works on Anakkampoyil-Meppadi tunnel road get under way
content: Project, which will offer an alternative to the Thamarassery Ghat road, expected to be completed in 60 months. The road connects Thiruvambady panchayat in Kozhikode district to Meppadi panchayat in Wayanad district

title: Ghose Commission finds former Chief Minister KCR accountable for lapses in Kaleshwaram Barrages: Uttam in Assembly
content: He says Commission pointed out that due procedures were not followed in various stage of execution of barrages, their operations and maintenance

title: Dharmasthala: Nikhil Kumaraswamy demands probe by Central agency
content: Claiming that the ‚ÄòSatya Yatra‚Äô taken up by the Janata Dal (Secular) was meant to protect dharma and not politically motivated, JDS) youth wing leader Nikhil Kumaraswamy on Sunday said there has been a conspiracy against Dharmasthala, which has to be investigated by a Central agency

title: DKS hails Mysuru kings and Urs community for building ‚Äòsecular and irreligious‚Äô Karnataka
content: Deputy Chief Minister D.K. Shivakumar on Sunday hailed the contribution of Mysuru kings and the Urs community towards building a secular and irreligious Karnataka with a focus on human development

title: Andhra Pradesh farmers grapple with 40% urea shortage during kharif season
content: Even the government has admitted there is a shortage of urea, says a senior leader of the tenant farmers‚Äô union. Confirming the shortfall, an Agriculture Department official says the government is working to ensure district-wise allocations

title: Compensation for crop loss, house damage in rain as per rules, says Minister
content: Deputy Commissioner instructs Dharwad officials to submit final consolidated report of joint survey by Monday evening

title: Kerala achieves top rankings in UDISE+ for 2024-25, says Sivankutty
content: Kerala‚Äôs achievement of 99.5% retention rate, indicating the fact that 99.5% out of every 100 students who enter Class I reach Class X, is significant especially when compared with the national average and the record of the other States, says Minister

title: Death threat video: Nellore Rural MLA accuses YSRCP of hatching plan to kill him
content: Kotamreddy Sridhar Reddy says not me, even my six-year-old grandson will not be cowed down by such threats; however, YSRCP ridicules the MLA‚Äôs accusations and rubbishes the act as a ‚Äòpolitical stunt‚Äô

title: Panel recommends inclusion of 28 OBCs on Socially and Educationally Backward Classes list for educational benefits
content: Those on the OBC list are eligible for reservation in government jobs, but students need to be on the SEBC list for accessing educational concessions such as scholarships and reservation in admissions.

title: Ashok lashes out at Congress, threatens Chamundeshwari chalo agitation
content: Leader of the Opposition in the Assembly R. Ashok threatened to launch a Chamundeshwari chalo rally on the lines of the Dharmasthala one and lashed out at the Congress for ‚Äúhurting the sentiments of Hindus‚Äù

title: Bishop Valloppilly Memorial Museum opens after phase one work
content: The State Archaeology department spent ‚Çπ36 lakh on construction, while the government granted ‚Çπ1.6 crore in 2021

title: Reduce minimum age to contest Assembly polls to 21, says Telangana CM
content: Youngsters, after clearing the civil service examination, govern districts and handle administrative responsibilities. Then why should they not be allowed to contest Assembly elections at 21? Revanth Reddy asks

title: More than 33,000 people apply for re-inclusion in Bihar electoral rolls
content: Over 15 lakh applications from new electors and over 2 lakh objections filed against names in draft list; no information from ECI in response to RTI queries on the basis for SIR 2025, and details of the 2003 intensive revision

title: BJP set to hold Dharmasthala chalo rally on September 1 seeking NIA probe to uncover conspiracy against Dharmasthala
content: With leaders of the Bharatiya Janata Party and the Janata Dal (Secular) making a beeline for Dharmasthala for over a week, the BJP will take out a State-wide rally and hold a huge convention in the temple town on Monday, to press for a National Investigation Agency (NIA) probe to uncover the ‚Äúlarger conspiracy‚Äù behind the slander against Manjunatheshwara temple and its administrators.

title: K-Stores will accept passport applications, says Minister
content: Services typically offered by Akshaya centres and common service centres will also be made available at the upgraded ration shops

title: With tailwind from ‚ÄòVoter Adhikar Yatra‚Äô, Congress to seek a better seat-sharing deal in Bihar
content: The yatra has given the Congress a platform to reassert its relevance, but its success will depend on translating public enthusiasm into electoral gains by strengthening the party‚Äôs organisation and crafting a sharper economic message

title: Russia-India-China troika on display at SCO; PM Modi, Putin, Xi share warm moments
content: Prime Minister Modi, Russian President Putin, and Chinese President Xi Jinping displayed camaraderie at the SCO Summit 2025 in Tianjin, exchanging handshakes and hugs. Modi shared pictures of the interactions on X, emphasizing the importance of exchanging perspectives. Xi Jinping, in his banquet address, called for unity among SCO members to safeguard regional peace amid global uncertainties.

title: Afghanistan earthquake: Over 200 dead, at least 500 injured after 6.0 magnitude quake
content: A devastating 6.0-magnitude earthquake struck Afghanistan's Kunar province, resulting in at least 250 fatalities and over 500 injuries. The midnight quake, followed by aftershocks, toppled homes along the Pakistan border. Rescue operations are underway in remote districts, with the toll expected to rise due to difficult access and fragile housing in the region.

title: Watch: PM Modi, Putin walk past Pak PM at SCO Summit; Shehbaz Sharif left looking on
content: During the SCO Summit in Tianjin, PM Modi and President Putin displayed camaraderie, while PM Modi and President Xi discussed border peace and resuming flights. India's S-400 missile defense system, dubbed "Sudarshan Chakra," played a crucial role in Operation Sindoor, successfully intercepting Pakistani drones and missiles aimed at Indian cities, bolstering India's air defense capabilities.

title: 'Third World Nation' fear: Trump warns of fallout if tariffs struck down
content: Donald Trump warned that the US would become a "Third World Nation" if courts struck down his tariffs. He defended them, claiming over $15 trillion would be invested in the US due to these tariffs, calling it a record. Trump emphasized that tariffs are strengthening the economy, leading to lower prices and virtually no inflation.

title: Population collapse warning: Pakistani man warns Danish man; Elon Musk responds
content: Elon Musk has ignited debate by agreeing with a Pakistani man's claim about demographic shifts in Denmark, highlighting his ongoing concern about global population decline. Musk argues that declining birth rates pose a significant threat to civilization, potentially leading to economic stagnation and labor shortages. He has also warned about Japan's population decline, suggesting AI as a potential solution.

title: SCO Summit: Xi slams 'bullying behaviour'; urges to oppose 'Cold War mentality'
content: At the Shanghai Cooperation Organisation summit in Tianjin, Chinese President Xi Jinping criticized what he termed the "bullying behaviour" in the world order. He urged Russia and India to resist a "Cold War mentality." Prime Minister Narendra Modi also participated in the summit, which focused on charting the SCO's future.

title: 'Brahmins profiteering': Trump aide's latest jibe at India over Russian oil
content: Peter Navarro accused India of indirectly funding Russia's war in Ukraine through discounted oil purchases, alleging that Brahmins are profiting at the expense of the Indian people. He criticized India's high tariffs, claiming they hurt American workers and taxpayers while indirectly funding the Russian war machine. Navarro also expressed optimism about trade negotiations with China.

title: Kalkaji Temple sewadar beaten to death: Attackers and victim had history of run-ins
content: Tensions over darshan and prasad distribution at Delhi's Kalkaji Temple appear to be the motive behind the murder of Yogendra Singh. Previous confrontations between the victim and the accused escalated into a fatal attack. Police have arrested five individuals, including the father of one attacker who allegedly provided shelter, and are searching for two more suspects.

title: Citizenship promise: An entire country is shifting to Australia; first agreement of its kind
content: Nearly 9,000 Tuvalu citizens, representing 82% of the population, have applied for Australia's new climate visa program, a key part of the Falepili Union pact. This initiative aims to provide a pathway for mobility as rising sea levels threaten Tuvalu's habitability. The agreement also commits Australia to defend Tuvalu and gives them a say in its defense pacts.

title: Ishita Mallik murder: How killer fled West Bengal with uncle‚Äôs help
content: Krishnanagar Police apprehended Kuldeep Singh, uncle of Deshraj Singh, from Gujarat's Jamnagar for allegedly tampering with evidence in the Ishita Mallik murder case. Kuldeep is accused of helping Deshraj, who fatally shot Mallik, flee after the incident. Police suspect Kuldeep knows Deshraj's whereabouts and that the firearm was sourced from Uttar Pradesh.

title: 'Bumrah is world class, credit to India for managing his workload': Wasim Akram
content: Wasim Akram hailed Jasprit Bumrah as a ‚Äúmodern-day great,‚Äù praising India for expertly managing his workload. While refusing to compare eras, Akram highlighted the increased challenges bowlers face in modern cricket due to aggressive batting. He also opposed the two-tier WTC system, stressing the need for quality teams and stronger domestic structures before introducing more nations to Test cricket.

title: Ghaziabad: 30 vehicles break down after refueling at Morta pump
content: Around 30 vehicle owners in Ghaziabad have filed a police complaint, alleging that their cars broke down shortly after refueling at a Bajaj HP station in Morta between August 26 and 29. Customers suspect adulterated diesel caused engine problems, potentially leading to repair costs as high as Rs 3.5 lakh per vehicle.

title: AI era reality: Accenture CEO to companies; there‚Äôs ‚Äòone thing‚Äô you can‚Äôt ignore
content: Accenture CEO Julie Sweet emphasizes that AI reinvention, not just implementation, is crucial for companies to thrive, linking AI investments directly to measurable performance outcomes. She highlights the importance of humility in leadership and dismisses predictions of widespread corporate failures due to AI.

title: Why is Agra‚Äôs Rs 500 crore petha industry facing existential crisis?
content: Agra's famed petha industry faces an uncertain future as a Supreme Court directive orders relocation of manufacturing units within the Taj Trapezium Zone to protect the Taj Mahal from pollution. This move threatens the livelihoods of nearly 5,000 people involved in the trade, who fear the financial burden of restarting elsewhere.

title: Bengaluru sexual assault: Knife-wielding intruder harasses PG girl, escapes with cash
content: In Bengaluru's BTM Layout, a 21-year-old woman was sexually harassed and robbed in her PG accommodation. An intruder entered her room early in the morning, assaulted her, and stole Rs 2,500. Despite her efforts to stop him, he escaped, and police are investigating the incident, which occurred at Laxmana Durga Ladies PG. The security guard was asleep during the incident.

title: Mumbai gridlock: Protesters camp, cook, urinate on streets; BMC scales up services
content: Protests in Mumbai's CSMT area severely impacted weekend sales around Crawford Market as festival shoppers stayed away due to safety concerns. The large crowds, numbering around 30,000, overwhelmed the BMC, leading to sanitation issues and strained resources.

title: Who is Devki Devi? ‚ÄòSolar Didi‚Äô wins PM‚Äôs praise; lighting up rural lives with dignity
content: Devki Devi, a resident of Muzaffarpur, Bihar, has become an inspiration for women empowerment. Referred to as "Solar Didi" by PM Modi, she overcame financial struggles by embracing solar energy for irrigation. With support from the JEEViKA self-help group, she secured a loan to install solar panels, irrigating over 40 acres for 112 farmers.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 opens above 24,500; Sensex up over 300 points
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened in green on Monday. While Nifty50 was above 24,500, BSE Sensex was up over 300 points.

title: E20 ethanol-blended petrol hits vehicle mileage, users bear brunt
content: Consumers are facing a double whammy as E20 petrol, while promoted for environmental benefits, leads to a 2-6% drop in vehicle mileage. Despite paying high fuel prices, users report reduced efficiency, prompting questions about the financial burden. A Niti Aayog report suggested lower retail prices for blended fuels to offset the efficiency loss, though ARAI studies claim no adverse impact.

title: 6.0 magnitude earthquake rocks Afghanistan: At least 20 killed; tremors felt in Pakistan
content: A 6.0-magnitude earthquake struck eastern Afghanistan near the Pakistan border, resulting in over 20 fatalities. More than 115 injured individuals have been hospitalized in Nangarhar and Kunar provinces. The shallow quake, followed by aftershocks, shook buildings across the region, with tremors felt as far as Islamabad. The incident occurred shortly after Nangarhar province experienced devastating floods, compounding the region's challenges.

title: ‚Äò2-system interaction‚Äô may trigger heavy rains in Uttarakhand, Himachal and J&K
content: North India's hill states brace for another intense spell of heavy rainfall as the IMD forecasts a convergence of the monsoon trough and an active western disturbance. Uttarakhand, Himachal Pradesh, and Jammu & Kashmir are at high risk of flash floods and landslides.

title: Priya Marathe‚Äôs sudden demise at 38: Who is her husband Shantanu Moghe?
content: Actress Priya Marathe, known for her roles in Pavitra Rishta and Kasamh Se, sadly passed away at 38 after battling cancer. Her last social media post, featuring her husband Shantanu Moghe at Amer Fort, has become a poignant memory for fans.

title: Rinku Singh Exclusive: 'Don't like being tagged as T20I specialist'
content: Rinku Singh, known for his T20 heroics, asserts his capabilities extend to red-ball cricket, aiming to represent India in Tests. Preparing for the Asia Cup 2025, he emphasizes evolving his technique with guidance from Abhishek Nair and Gautam Gambhir. Singh aspires to contribute across all formats, driven by self-belief and a desire to win the T20 World Cup.

title: 'Country would be completely destroyed': Trump defends tariffs after US court setback
content: Donald Trump defended his trade policy after a court declared most of his tariffs illegal. He thanked a judge who sided with him. Trump claimed tariffs brought trillions of dollars to the US. A court ruled Trump overstepped his authority with the tariffs. The levies were set to cover about 69 percent of US imports.

title: Viral US Open clip: Polish CEO grabs kid‚Äôs cap; online outrage erupts
content: Piotr Szczerek, a Polish businessman and Drogbruk co-founder, faced global criticism after a video surfaced of him taking a signed cap intended for a young fan at the 2025 US Open. This act sparked outrage, leading to calls for boycotts of his company and highlighting the impact of public behavior in the digital age.

title: Man arrested after car crashes into Russian Consulate in Australia - watch
content: A 39-year-old man was arrested in Sydney after intentionally crashing his car into the Russian consulate on Monday morning. The incident occurred around 8 am, prompting a police response to reports of an unauthorized vehicle. During the arrest, a 24-year-old police officer sustained a hand injury and received on-site treatment.

title: History! Meet 5-year-old Aarini Lahoty - India‚Äôs youngest with FIDE ratings
content: Aarini Lahoty, a five-year-old chess prodigy from Delhi, has made history as the youngest Indian player to achieve FIDE ratings in classical, rapid, and blitz formats. Born in 2019, she is the first from her age group to accomplish this feat, holding impressive ratings across all three categories.

title: Bags delayed, toilets dirty? Regulator plans penalty for airports
content: Airports in India may face reduced user development fees for lapses like dirty toilets, baggage delays, and long queues, as per a proposal from the Airports Economic Regulatory Authority (AERA). The regulator plans to implement uniform performance standards for major airports, linking compliance to tariff structures with rewards for exceeding standards and penalties for failures.

title: PM: Welfare of 2.8bn linked to ties; Xi says friendship right choice for both
content: Amid strained India-US relations and global trade concerns, PM Modi and President Xi Jinping met to strengthen cooperation on trade, terrorism, and regional issues, emphasizing their roles as development partners, not rivals. They reaffirmed strategic autonomy, aiming to resolve border disputes peacefully and boost economic ties while maintaining border tranquility.

title: GST rejig: E-comm sellers brace for billing woes amid festive rush
content: E-commerce sellers on platforms like Amazon and Flipkart are facing uncertainty regarding GST slab changes ahead of the festive season sales. Concerns include delays in reflecting updated tax rates on platforms, discrepancies in invoicing, and issues with product returns due to rate differences.

title: Ties looking up but key border difference remains; India says border peace insurance for ties
content: President Xi Jinping proposed suggestions for a healthy China-India relationship, emphasizing that the border issue shouldn't define the overall bilateral ties. However, PM Modi stressed that the boundary situation impacts relations, highlighting the need for border peace. Both leaders acknowledged the importance of their relationship for global stability, with discussions also involving future cooperation.

title: ESPN bars Jason Kelce: YouTube wanted him for Chiefs opener; new policy blocks rival shows
content: YouTube's pursuit of Jason Kelce for its exclusive Chargers-Chiefs broadcast in Brazil was thwarted by ESPN. Kelce, now an ESPN analyst, is restricted from appearing on competitor platforms like YouTube due to a new company policy. This decision marks a shift from last season, as ESPN tightens control over its on-air talent amid the rise of streaming in live sports.

title: ‚ÄòParam Sundari‚Äô picks pace: Rs 10.25cr Sunday lifts total; rom-com crosses Rs 26cr in 3 days
content: Janhvi Kapoor and Sidharth Malhotra's 'Param Sundari' has seen a successful opening weekend, earning ‚Çπ26.75 crore in its first three days. The rom-com, directed by Tushar Jalota, witnessed a steady increase in box office collections, with Sunday recording the highest single-day earnings. Critics have praised the film's picturesque backdrops, music, and the charming chemistry between the lead actors.

title: 2029 Lok Sabha in mind? Congress uses ‚ÄòVoter Adhikar Yatra‚Äô to reclaim ground
content: Rahul Gandhi's 'Voter Adhikar Yatra' concluded in Patna, signaling Congress's resurgence in Bihar after nearly three decades. The yatra, a united opposition show, highlighted Congress's assertive strategy, potentially unsettling its alliance with RJD. While Tejashwi Yadav symbolically positioned himself as the 'charioteer,' Congress avoided endorsing any CM candidate, focusing on grassroots revival and seat-sharing negotiations, hinting at future political dynamics.

title: Lure of easy money: Techie in Bengaluru duped of Rs 91 lakh in work-from-home scam
content: A Bengaluru software engineer lost Rs 91 lakh in a cyber fraud that spanned five weeks. Lured by a Telegram user with a work-from-home offer promising high returns, the engineer was directed to a fake hotel booking website. He made multiple deposits before realizing he had been scammed and reported the incident to the police.

title: College football: AP Poll Week 2 predictions - Who rises, who falls in the rankings
content: The 2025 college football season kicked off with upsets and power shifts, highlighted by Ohio State's victory over Texas. Florida State's dominant performance against Alabama also shook up the rankings. These results are expected to significantly alter the Week 2 AP Top 25 poll, with teams like Illinois potentially rising and Alabama facing a steep drop.

title: Hotel rooms-casinos: Services facing 12%, 28% GST in focus
content: Team GST is convening to address the tax slabs on various services, including hotel rooms, air travel, and banking, with potential rate adjustments under consideration. While some services like casino entry fees may face higher taxes, there's a push to ease rates on common services like apartment maintenance charges.

title: ‚ÄòBiggest flames, black smoke‚Äô: Glenn Cadrez recalls I-15 rescue; 4 killed in crash tragedy
content: Former Denver Broncos linebacker Glenn Cadrez is being hailed as a hero for rescuing a man from a burning car after a fatal crash in Temecula, California. Cadrez, a two-time Super Bowl champion, witnessed the head-on collision on August 23rd and acted instinctively. He pulled the 25-year-old man to safety before the flames spread.

title: Chaos before Clash: Rhea Ripley mobbed in Paris; sends warning to overzealous fans
content: WWE's Rhea Ripley, in Paris for Clash at the Castle, faced an unsettling incident when fans mobbed her while she was entering her Uber. Ripley took to social media to express her discomfort, reminding fans that wrestlers deserve personal space and respect. She warned against such behavior, hinting at a potential 'Mami' mode if boundaries are crossed.

title: Couple killed, 2 critical among injured in firecracker factory blast in Lucknow
content: A powerful explosion at an illegal firecracker factory in Lucknow's Behta village resulted in the tragic deaths of a couple and injuries to at least five others. The blast, which occurred on Sunday afternoon, caused the collapse of several houses and triggered a massive rescue operation. Forensic teams confirmed the presence of firecracker-making materials at the site, indicating unlicensed manufacturing.

title: ‚ÄòHighways buried‚Äô: Landslides, floods batter Himachal & J&K; pilgrimages halted
content: Torrential monsoon rains have triggered flash floods and landslides in Himachal Pradesh and Jammu & Kashmir, severely disrupting transportation and trade. Key highways, including national routes, are blocked, leaving farmers in Lahaul-Spiti facing significant losses due to disrupted apple markets.

title: ‚ÄòTribals exempt from UCC‚Äô: Rijiju clarifies govt stand
content: Union Minister Kiren Rijiju assured that tribals in the northeast and other regions would be exempt from the proposed Uniform Civil Code, allowing them to maintain their social systems. Speaking at an event, Rijiju highlighted the government's commitment to UCC while respecting tribal autonomy.

title: '10 luxury vehicles, 3 superbikes': ED raids Odisha mining biz
content: The Enforcement Directorate (ED) seized luxury vehicles and assets worth crores from mining businessman Shakti Ranjan Dash in Bhubaneswar, Odisha, due to his alleged involvement in a Rs 1,396 crore loan fraud case linked to Himachal Pradesh's ITCOL.

title: 'Two-way force': Thompson praises teammate Davis; calls him 'best power forward of his gen'
content: Dallas Mavericks guard Klay Thompson believes Anthony Davis is the best power forward. Thompson is excited about the team's frontcourt potential for the 2025-2026 season. He praised Davis's skills and the team's depth. Davis's health is crucial for Dallas's Western Conference hopes. The Mavericks acquired Davis from the Los Angeles Lakers.

title: Big bloc, strong words: SCO flexes global influence as US bristles; what is India's role?
content: Leaders from the Shanghai Cooperation Organization's ten member states, including India, Russia, and China, are convening in northern China. The SCO, seen as an alternative to US-led approaches, encompasses 40% of the world's population.

title: Kanpur horror: 11-year-old mauled to death by pet dog; owner arrested
content: In Etawah, police arrested a pet owner after an 11-year-old boy died from severe dog bite injuries. A post-mortem confirmed the boy's death was due to the dog attack, which included multiple neck wounds. Locals reported the same dog had injured two laborers previously, prompting residents to drive the dog away for safety.

title: Congress To Conclude Its 1,300 Km Voter Adhikar Yatra In Patna Today
content: The Congress' ongoing 'Voter Adhikar Yatra' in Bihar will conclude in Patna on Monday with a symbolic padyatra (foot march) at Gandhi Maidan, marking the final leg of its campaign to raise awareness about electoral rights.

title: What PM Modi Said At SCO Summit's Plenary Session In China: Full Statement
content: PM Modi addressed the SCO Summit's plenary session which included the participation of more than 20 foreign leaders and 10 heads of international organisations.

title: Shehbaz Sharif Snubbed? Pak PM On Sidelines As PM Modi, Putin Walk Past
content: In one of the videos going viral from the summit, Pakistan Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif was seen looking on with a grim expression as Prime Minister Modi engaged in an animated informal chat minutes ahead of the plenary session in Tianjin.

title: PM Modi China Visit Live Updates: "India Taken Lead In Fight Against Terrorism", Says PM Modi At SCO Summit
content: PM Modi in China for SCO Summit LIVE Updates:¬†Prime Minister Narendra Modi is set to attend the Shanghai Cooperation Organisation (SCO) summit in Tianjin, China, on Sunday.

title: Stray Dogs In Meghalaya Are "Dangerous" In Nature: High Court To Supreme Court
content: In a significant development, the Meghalaya High Court has requested the Supreme Court to allow it to retain a Public Interest Litigation (PIL) on the stray dogs menace.

title: 'Hongqi': All about Xi Jinping's Preferred Car In Which PM Modi Travelled In China
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is using China's Hongqi L5 limousine during his two-day visit to China for the Shanghai Cooperation Organisation (SCO) Summit.

title: 6 Dead In Separate Ganesh Immersion Accidents In Andhra, Chandrababu Naidu Expresses Grief
content: Six people lost their lives in two separate tragic accidents that occurred during Ganesh immersion programmes across Andhra Pradesh. Following this, Chief Minister Nara Chandrababu Naidu expressed grief over the incidents.

title: Handshakes, Hugs, Smiles: PM Modi, Putin, Xi Bonhomie At SCO Summit
content: The friendly interactions between PM Modi, Russia's Vladimir Putin, and China's Xi Jinping come amid their own strained ties with the US.

title: Hundreds Feared Dead After 6.0 Magnitude Earthquake Strikes Afghanistan
content: Hundreds were feared dead and injured in a earthquake of magnitude 6 that struck Afghanistan's rugged northeastern province of Kunar, authorities said on Monday, as rescuers combed the rubble of homes in a hunt for survivors.

title: Mumbai Police Warns Of Traffic Delays Amid Maratha Quota Stir At Azad Maidan
content: With Maratha protesters led by Manoj Jarange occupying Azad Maidan and various areas in south Mumbai, police have cautioned motorists about occasional disruptions in traffic movement towards south Mumbai on Monday morning.

title: "Brahmins Profiteering...": Top Trump Aide On India's Russian Oil Trade
content: US President Donald Trump's Trade Advisor Peter Navarro doubled down on his accusation of India profiting off the Russia-Ukraine war by buying Moscow's oil at a discount, refining it and selling it to buyers in Europe and elsewhere.

title: Commercial LPG Cylinders Price Reduced, New Rates Effective Today
content: Oil marketing companies (OMCs) on Sunday said that the price of commercial LPG gas cylinders will be reduced by Rs 51.50, effective September 1.

title: Rajasthan Man Pours Acid On Wife Due To Her Dark Complexion, Gets Death Penalty
content: He would harass her over "dark complexion" and her weight. And would keep fighting with her over the same thing again and again.

title: US Would Be "Completely Destroyed" Without Tariffs: Trump Slams Court Ruling
content: US President Donald Trump on Sunday (local time) warned that without tariffs, the United States would be "completely destroyed" and its military power would be "instantly obliterated."

title: "Never Felt Better In My Life": Donald Trump Amid He Is 'Dead' Viral Trend
content: US President Donald Trump on Monday dismissed the speculations of his 'deteriorating' health in a post on Truth Social, saying he has "never felt better" in his life.

title: PM Modi-Xi Meeting Sadly Failed To Deliver On Substantive Issues: A Owaisi
content: AIMIM president Asaduddin Owaisi on Sunday alleged that Prime Minister Narendra Modi's meeting with Chinese President Xi Jinping has "failed" to answer the critical questions that Indians were looking for.

title: "Issue Reservation On Maratha Quota On Available Records": Activist Jarange
content: Activist Manoj Jarange on Sunday asked the Devendra Fadnavis dispensation to issue a government resolution (GR) on Maratha reservations based on available records.

title: As Bihar Poll Revision Deadline Nears, Over 2 Lakh Seek Removal Of Names
content: The month-long period to demand inclusion or deletion of names from the electoral rolls of Bihar ends on Monday, with more than 33,000 electors filing pleas to add their names to the list.

title: "Crucial Evidence" Recovered In Dharmasthala Case Investigation
content: The Special Investigation Team (SIT), which has arrested the complainant in the Dharmasthala multiple murders, rapes and burials case, has recovered "crucial evidence" when they escorted him to Bengaluru as part of the investigation, official sources

title: A's monitor Kurtz; Chourio returns for Brewers with homer
content: fantasy baseball buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around MLB . the last slate of the month gets an early start with a 12:10 p.m. ET affair at Great American Ballpark .

title: Projecting the CFP top 12 after Week 1
content: "the days of a national champion being undefeated are over," coach Steve Sarkisian says . the longhorns aren't alone, but the early results shook up the playoff pecking order . here's what the selection committee's top 12 would look like if it were released today .

title: Ben Shelton and Trinity Rodman relationship timeline: Shelton on hand at Rodman's match against Chicago
content: Ben Shelton and Trinity Rodman revealed they had been dating on social media in march . they've shown up for each other in a big way, including at each other's matches . the 2023 semifinalist returned the flavor by appearing at the Washington Spirit's match .

title: PLL semifinals preview: Stats, matchups, how to watch
content: the 2025 premier lacrosse league playoffs continue this weekend on ESPN . the four teams travel to Subaru Park outside of Philadelphia for the semifinals . sports analyst Quint Kessenich revealed his keys to both matches . he will move ahead of casey Powel with four points .

title: The game is on the line: Which WNBA player gets the last shot?
content: nneka Ogwumike's clutch bucket at the buzzer gives the Storm an 84-82 win over the Mystics . sports experts contend there's no such thing as a consistent clutch player in any sport . who are the biggest clutch shooters in the WNBA, when a game is on the line .

title: Szoboszlai, Liverpool make statement start to 2025-26 in win over Arsenal
content: Dominik Szoboszlai scores one of the greatest free kicks in premier league history . the german beat arsenal keeper David Raya from 30 yards with a powerful right-footed strike in the 83rd minute . arsenal had controlled the game without being able to create clear chances .
